name: shared
description: Contains shared type definitions for citadel client/server.

scripts.compile: mkdir lib; npm run clean && npx tsc
scripts.clean: rm tsconfig.tsbuildinfo; find ./src/ -type f -name '*.js.map' -delete && find ./src/ -type f -name '*.js' -delete && find ./src/ -type f -name '*.jsx' -delete && rm -rf ./lib/ && rm -rf ./build/

author: Miles van der Lely
